DOC.brief_summary: The propose study seek investigate extent Narrative Exposure Therapy ( NET ) effective treatment reduction symptom Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) depression improvement daily function Iranian woman experience intimate partner violence ( IPV ) . In addition , study seek investigate whether NET therapy could lead reduction Intimate Partner Violence ( IPV ) within marriage .
DOC.brief_title: NET Iranian Women Suffering From Post Traumatic Stress Symptoms
DOC.criteria: victim Intimate Partner Violence seek help target clinic order reduce psychological symptom , currently live together partner/husband , meeting set cutoff point PTSD scale accord DSMIV . schizophrenia , epilepsy , mental retardation , drug abuse malnourishment
